name: S_4_6_6_Enrollment_in_Public_Health_Surveys
title: S.4.6.6 Enrollment in Public Health Surveys (Function)
description: Support access to public health surveys.
purpose:
A PHR Account Holder will have the ability to participate in public health surveys and store their responses to those surveys.

Example(s): The World Health Organization offers a survey to research the number of smokers who also have a specific related disease.

statement.label: S.4.6.6#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability for the PHR Account Holder to manage participation in public health surveys from local, state and federal agencies.

statement.label: S.4.6.6#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture administrative information necessary to enroll in public health surveys.

statement.label: S.4.6.6#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to determine public health surveys that apply to the PHR Account Holder according to the PHR Account Holder's preferences and/or consents, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: S.4.6.6#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture PHR Account Holder responses to public health surveys.
